description:
GNOME 47 desktop environment is out now with support for accent colors, as well as numerous new features and enhancements across all apps and components.

The post GNOME 47 “Denver” Desktop Environment Officially Released, Here’s What’s New appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: GNOME 47 “Denver” Desktop Environment Officially Released, Here’s What’s New
